Sentencas: Lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x = 0-0.4) were prepared by solid state synthesis to investigate the effect of Mg doping on crystal structure and ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Crystal structure and ionic conductivity of Mg-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x=0-0.4)

Sentencas: Rietveld analysis of the powder XRD patterns reveals that Mg substitution on Si site results in significant enlargement of channel triangles, favoring oxide-ion conduction.
Titulo: Crystal structure and ionic conductivity of Mg-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x=0-0.4)

Sentencas: Furthermore, an increase of Mg concentration significantly influences the linear density of interstitial oxygen, which plays an important role in ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Crystal structure and ionic conductivity of Mg-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x=0-0.4)

Sentencas: The Arrhenius plots of La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x = 0-0.4) suggest that Mg-doped samples present higher conductivity and lower activation energy than non-doped La10Si6O27, and La10Si5.8Mg0.2O26.8 exhibits the highest conductivity with a value of 3.0 Chi 10(-2)
Titulo: Crystal structure and ionic conductivity of Mg-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x=0-0.4)
Crystal structure and ionic conductivity of Mg-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x=0-0.4)

Sentencas: Such conductive behavior agrees well with the refined results.
Titulo: Crystal structure and ionic conductivity of Mg-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x=0-0.4)

Sentencas: The corresponding mechanism has been discussed in this paper.
Titulo: Crystal structure and ionic conductivity of Mg-doped apatite-type lanthanum silicates La10Si6-xMgxO27-x (x=0-0.4)
